header.e: Both Sample Qty and Sample Size field must be either contain value or empty.

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: ma_vung
field.check: ma_vung not in (select ma_vung from bidmvung where (@admin = 1 or not exists(select 1 from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user) or ma_vung in (select ma_vung from bisysplantrights where user_id = @user)))

field.name: ma_loai
field.check: ma_loai not in (select ma_loai from bikddmloai where kd_dac_tinh = '1')

field.name: ma_dac_tinh
field.check: ma_dac_tinh not in (select ma_dac_tinh from bikddmdactinh)

Liên hệ với người quản trị hệ thống nếu bạn có thể được truy cập vào chức năng này.' else N'You are not authorized or you do not have permission to execute this action. Contact the System administrator if you believe you should be able to execute this action.' end -- Check &Checking; select @field = 'ma_cd' if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount;
